attributes.action: Create an transparent public body of non MPS's to review MP's expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been proven that some MP’s can no longer be trusted with the responsibility of having an expense account.  Some of the claims that have been made my MP’s recently could have resulted in disciplinary action had those MP’s made their claims whilst working for a company in the ‘real world’.

We require that the Government create a well funded, permanent and transparent public body consisting of members who are not and have never been a Member of Parliamentnor an employee of an MP.

This body would have the right to request all expenses submitted by MP's.  The body would be obliged to investigate all claims and administer disciplinary action against MP's who have made false or misleading claims.  This body would also be required to publicly publish its findings (it would not publish details of MP’s where no misconduct has been proven).

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
